title: ATLAS - Send ACCU/DECCU file from MUREX to ENGINE

task_list.instruction_title: Send ACCU/DECCU file (ExportMappingMaster.xlsx) from MUREX to ENGINE

If the file from MUREX is not received before FFUTR1 creation by ENGINE, this task can be done after Star1 and the task [TRT-13099](TRT-13099_116108887.html) and will require a rerun of ENGINE step FFUTR1 creation ([TRT-6021](TRT-6021_116108828.html)).
